1000 lw $1 100 $10
1004 lw $2 200 $10
1008 add $3 $2 $1
1012 sw $3 300 $10
1016 addi $10 $10 4
1020 bneq $10 $11 loop

1016 addi $10 $10 4

1000 lw $1 100 $10

1008 add $3 $2 $1
1012 sw $3 300 $10
1016 addi $10 $10 4
1020 bneq $10 $11 loop 
1000 lw $1 100 $10
1004 lw $2 200 $10
1008 add $3 $2 $1
1012 sw $3 300 $10
1016 addi $10 $10 4
1020 bneq $10 $11 loop 
1024 add $10 $0 $0
